snippet.title: Destiny's Divide Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Destiny's Divide is an upcoming fantasy Card Game made in Unreal Engine. It is a free to play PvP Hardcore trading card game. https://destinysdivide.com - Play now!

Some unique features include:

- Trading/Lending/Borrowing
- Unique cards
- Cards with different abilities
- Energy Augments
- Progression Cards
- The Sharedboard
- The Heroic Being
- Hardcore Game mode

You may read more about all of these features on our website and sign up for the alpha/beta: https://destinysdivide.com

Join us on discord: https://discord.gg/destinysdivide
Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/DestinysDivide
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/destinysdivide/
